name: v1.5.8-1
body:
## Changelog

da809bc Sigh, okay, made a mistake, releasing 1.5.8-1.
92e307d If tag already exists, don't moan please.

name: v1.5.7
body:
## Changelog

13d2bdd .goreleaser.yml: Update manifest format for new GoReleaser.
314a72a Release yak version 1.5.7.
2696abf Merge pull request #104 from redbubble/paul/better-command-completions
03d2de4 README.md: Add example of '--' in commands.
96e226c README.md: Update bit about '--'.
a09cffd cmd/root.go(rootCmd): Modify description to call it "command", not "subcommand".
6f89db1 static/completions/yak.zsh: Improve completion of commands after `--`.
db1ac13 Merge pull request #102 from redbubble/mp-use-okta-sessions
bcdd418 Remove CLI flag for now, make config-only
5b76430 Limit how long we cache our Okta session to a day by default
99dc9ef Remove unneeded gob re-initialisation check
6180520 Refresh our session as a way to test it between runs & add better debug output
ec1a8f1 Add basic logging / verbose flag for debugging caching
d6859b1 go mod tidy
d176318 De-dup gob register
457d523 Remove pps
55cd331 Cache the session instead of the SAML payload
a428423 Rename parameters in cache.Check
7641d00 Rename AssumeRoleFromCache (it doesn't always use cache)
801ad1e Unify assume role steps in print_credentials.go & shim.go
de6249f Scrappy WIP on prototyping session support
e156536 Merge pull request #103 from redbubble/mp-github-actions
c9fe82c Github actions
fc9ce48 swap out go-passe for gotestsum, avoid polluting go.sum in travis

name: v1.5.6
body:
## Changelog

9641ceb Move to go.mod

name: v1.2.0
body:
Config and data are now stored in line with the XDG specs. Also added a --version command.

## Changelog

45418ac Continue to support old config style
ec27ba7 Move config files to follow XDG spec
6eed2a5 Add a nice shiny yak
69d87e2 Make the SAML endpoint in the README look like the app embed link
f434891 Disambiguate release and dev builds
9a0d3de Mention what you're running
430cb40 Add a --version command

name: v1.1.3
body:
## Changelog

2ace357 Set a default value for AWS session duration
8db9d9f Fix segfault when listing roles and alias section did not exist
8b8eccd Add command-line arguments for the okta domain and aws saml endpoint
205f020 Print a sensible error message if no saml endpoint or domain are set
deebee0 De-confuse MFA prompt.
225542d Clearer error messages.
87268a5 Send errors to Stderr from the root command

ef4ddb8 Make completion filenames more consistent.

9edbbbb Add Homebrew package for those macOS peeps!

efe60c1 Update installation instructions in the README

## Changelog

27a34f8 Generate Linux packages on build

name: v1.0.0
body: This is the first, stable release of `yak`. It supports logging in to AWS using Okta, use as a shim and to dump environment variables, caching of credentials and listing of roles.
